email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $50.75 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Demurrage is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.75 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15-20 October? Also, please confirm the demurrage terms and send over the draft charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.75 works for you. Laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Demurrage is $25,000 per day, pro rata, as previously mentioned. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ll review the charter party once received. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John
